scripts.start:linux: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx netlify-lambda serve src
scripts.build:linux: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx netlify-lambda build src
scripts.start:win: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx netlify-lambda serve src
scripts.build:win: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npx netlify-lambda build src
